markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Paint Set](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1337)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 59</row>

**Price** 1 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This set of painting supplies includes paints, brushes, jars, a palette, a set of small canvases, and a miniature easel. You can refill your paint set with extra paints and canvas for 1 sp.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Paint Set
